source:
TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_SEQ_00P'obyano requires an adventurer to aid in the fireworks festivities of the Moonfire Faire.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_SEQ_00※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

常夏の島の紅蓮祭実行委員ペ・オビヤノは、冒険者に海上花火の催しを手伝ってほしいようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_SEQ_01P'obyano asks that you help light fireworks for the Moonfire Faire. Use the summer firework at three firework mortars located in the vicinity of the Isle of Endless Summer.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_SEQ_01※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

ペ・オビヤノから、花火の点火を頼まれた。常夏の島付近にある3箇所の「」に「」を使おう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_SEQ_02<tab>You used the summer firework on the firework mortars. Report back to P'obyano on the Isle of Endless Summer.
target: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA7B701 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DDB01 /var>を使い、花火を点火した。常夏の島の「紅蓮祭実行委員ペ・オビヤノ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_SEQ_03<tab>You took word of your deeds back to P'obyano. Speak to her again if you wish to help further with the Moonfire Faire fireworks.
target: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_SEQ_03<tab>ペ・オビヤノに報告した。気が向いたら、また彼女に声をかけて、海上花火の催しを手伝うのもよいだろう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_TODO_00<tab>Use the summer firework on a firework mortar.

target: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_TODO_01<tab>紅蓮祭実行委員ペ・オビヤノに報告

source: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_000<tab>Back for more, are you? I'll not turn away an offer to help. Would you see fit to light some more fireworks for us?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_000あら、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
また協力してくれるのね。
それじゃ、今回も花火の点火をお願いできる？

source: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_001<tab>Just in case you'd forgotten how it is done─you need only throw a summer firework into a firework mortar near where the faire-goers are gathered.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_001やり方はもうわかってると思うけど、念のためにもう一度。
お客さんが集まっている場所の近くにある「」に、
この「」を投入してちょうだい。

source: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_002<tab>There is no need for you to speak to Jiriri any further. But this time, I ask that you light fireworks in three locations rather than just the one. Don't overheat out there!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_002今回はジリリさんのところへ寄らなくて大丈夫だけど、
代わりに、3箇所の「」で花火を点火して。
よろしく頼んだわよ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_010<tab>You simply cannot get enough of these fireworks, can you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Very well, you'll hear no complaints from me.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_010あら、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
声をかけてくれたってことは、また手伝ってくれるのよね？

source: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_011<tab>The task is the same as before. Light the fireworks by throwing a summer firework into a firework mortar near where our faire-goers are gathered. I will keep an eye to the skies.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_011それじゃあ、前回と同じく、
「」を3箇所の「」に投入して。
よろしく頼んだわよ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_020<tab>Remember now─you must throw the summer fireworks into three firework mortars. The faire-goers await. Hurry along, now!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_020「」を3箇所の「」に投入して。
よろしく頼んだわよ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_030<tab>Yet another job well done. Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. If you care to help further, you know where to find me. Until then, have a merry Moonfire Faire!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_030花火の点火、お疲れさま！
本当に助かったわ。
よければ、また手伝ってちょうだい。
